new_dataset.title: Human-friendly dataset title
new_dataset.notes: Any special notes, caveats, lineage, etc.
new_dataset.blockers: e.g., awaiting data review, pending security approval
new_dataset.performance_notes: e.g., Tile-cached, feature count limits, etc.

new_attribute.label: e.g., State Name
new_attribute.type: e.g., string | integer | float | date | enumerated
new_attribute.definition: Short definition of what this attribute represents.
new_attribute.values: For enumerated types: JSON array like [{"code":1,"label":"...","description":"..."}]

label: RMP Identifier
definition: Unique identifier for the RMP area.

expected_value.label: State
expected_value.definition: Two-letter state or territory code.

expected_value.label: Effective Date
expected_value.definition: Date the plan or designation became effective.

expected_value.label: Fire Identifier
expected_value.definition: Unique identifier for the fire event.

expected_value.label: Fire Name
expected_value.definition: Common name of the fire, if assigned.

expected_value.label: Acres Burned
expected_value.definition: Total acres burned within the fire perimeter.

expected_value.label: Discovery Date
expected_value.definition: Date the fire was first discovered.

expected_value.label: ACEC Identifier
expected_value.definition: Unique identifier for the ACEC.

expected_value.label: ACEC Name
expected_value.definition: Official name of the ACEC.

expected_value.label: Example Attribute
expected_value.definition: This example attribute exists to demonstrate and explain the attribute fields shown in the catalog UI (ID, Label, Type, Nullable, Description, Example, and Allowed values for enumerated types).
expected_value.expected_value: Sample value used only for demonstration.

expected_value.label: Estimated Feature Count
expected_value.definition: Approximate number of features or records in the dataset.

expected_value.label: Official Program Layer
expected_value.definition: Indicates whether this dataset is the officially endorsed program layer for its topic.

expected_value.label: Managing Agency
expected_value.definition: Primary federal agency responsible for managing the feature.

values.label: BLM
values.description: Bureau of Land Management

values.label: NPS
values.description: National Park Service

values.label: USFS
values.description: U.S. Forest Service

values.label: USFWS
values.description: U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service

values.label: BOR
values.description: Bureau of Reclamation

expected_value.label: Access Sensitivity
expected_value.definition: High-level data sensitivity category for sharing and public access.

values.label: Public
values.description: Suitable for open public release.

values.label: CUI
values.description: Controlled Unclassified Information; share only per policy.

values.label: Internal only
values.description: Internal use only; not cleared for public release.

expected_value.label: RMP Status
expected_value.definition: Planning status of the Resource Management Plan.

values.label: Approved
values.description: Approved RMP with decisions currently in effect.

values.label: Draft
values.description: Draft RMP in review and not yet approved.

values.label: In revision
values.description: Existing RMP currently being amended or revised.

expected_value.label: Fire Cause
expected_value.definition: Best-known primary cause of the fire.

values.label: Lightning
values.description: Ignition caused by lightning or other natural sources.

values.label: Human-caused
values.description: Ignition caused by human activity.

values.label: Unknown
values.description: Cause has not been determined or recorded.

expected_value.label: ACEC Status
expected_value.definition: Current designation status of the ACEC.

values.label: Designated
values.description: ACEC is currently designated and in effect.

values.label: Proposed
values.description: ACEC has been proposed but is not yet designated.

values.label: Released
values.description: ACEC designation has been removed or is no longer in effect.

expected_value.label: WSA Identifier
expected_value.definition: Unique identifier for the Wilderness Study Area.

expected_value.label: WSA Name
expected_value.definition: Official name of the Wilderness Study Area.

expected_value.label: WSA Status
expected_value.definition: Current status of the Wilderness Study Area.

values.label: Pending
values.description: WSA is under review and not yet resolved.

values.label: Designated Wilderness
values.description: WSA has been designated as wilderness by Congress.

values.label: Released
values.description: WSA has been released from further wilderness consideration.

expected_value.label: Lease Identifier
expected_value.definition: Unique identifier for the oil and gas lease.

expected_value.label: Lease Status
expected_value.definition: Current administrative status of the lease.

values.label: Active
values.description: Lease is currently in effect.

values.label: Expired
values.description: Lease has expired according to its terms.

values.label: Terminated
values.description: Lease has been terminated or canceled.

values.label: Pending
values.description: Lease is pending issuance or approval.

expected_value.label: Operator Name
expected_value.definition: Name of the designated lease operator or lessee.

expected_value.label: Commodity
expected_value.definition: Primary mineral commodity covered by the lease.

values.label: Oil
values.description: Lease is primarily for oil.

values.label: Gas
values.description: Lease is primarily for gas.

values.label: Oil and Gas
values.description: Lease covers both oil and gas.

values.label: Other
values.description: Lease covers other mineral commodities.

expected_value.label: ROW Identifier
expected_value.definition: Unique identifier for the right-of-way authorization.

expected_value.label: ROW Type
expected_value.definition: Type of facility or use authorized by the right-of-way.

values.label: Transmission Line
values.description: Electric transmission line right-of-way.

values.label: Pipeline
values.description: Pipeline right-of-way.

values.label: Road
values.description: Road or access route right-of-way.

values.label: Other
values.description: Other type of authorized facility or use.

expected_value.label: Authority
expected_value.definition: Legal authority or statute under which the right-of-way was issued.

datasets.title: BLM Administrative Units
datasets.description: This feature data set covers both BLM administrative land areas and office locations. Land areas are depicted with polygons for the smallest administrative unit (field offices). Other levels of administrative units, other, district and state, were derived from these polygons. Overviews were created to improve drawing speed and should not be used for analysis.
datasets.performance_notes: Tile-cached for fast rendering at national scale

datasets.id: This is a hidden unique ID for the dataset used for the Catalog UI.
datasets.objname: Object name is the editable database oject such as a feature class in the database.
datasets.title: Data Catalog Field Explanations
datasets.description: Plain language description of what this data catalog item is.
datasets.agency_owner: Agency Owner is the high-level owning agency responsible for the dataset (e.g., Bureau of Land Management).
datasets.office_owner: The branch, division, or office responsible for updating and maintaining the dataset.
datasets.contact_email: Email address of the best point of contant for this dataset.
topics: Topics can be added to help group datasets by theme. Example: planning

extent._comment: extent is OPTIONAL - this may be used for a future feature of the site.

datasets._comment: projection and geometry_type are OPTIONAL - they may be used for future features of the site.
datasets.update_frequency: How often the dataset updates: monthly, daily, etc.
datasets.status: Dataset status: authoritative, planned, depreciated, etc.
datasets.public_web_service: This is the URL to the public web servive for the dataset.
datasets.internal_web_service: The URL of the internal web service for the dataset.
datasets.data_standard: URL to the data standard for the dataset.
datasets.access_level: Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) category or "PUBLIC" if none.
datasets.notes: OPTIONAL field to use in the rare case that there is a need to share additional information here about this dataset to the user.

datasets.title: BLM Resource Management Plan Boundaries
datasets.description: Polygon boundaries of BLM Resource Management Plan decision areas.
datasets.notes: Used in NEPA and land use planning program-wide.
datasets.performance_notes: Supports dynamic queries; no tile cache

datasets.title: BLM Wildfire Perimeters
datasets.description: Perimeters of wildfires intersecting BLM-managed lands.
datasets.notes: Includes only perimeters that intersect BLM-administered lands.
datasets.performance_notes: High update frequency during fire season; may have latency

datasets.title: BLM Areas of Critical Environmental Concern (ACECs)
datasets.description: Polygon boundaries of designated Areas of Critical Environmental Concern (ACECs) on BLM-administered lands.
datasets.notes: Includes currently designated ACECs; proposed ACECs are maintained separately.
datasets.performance_notes: Low feature count; suitable for national web maps

datasets.title: BLM Wilderness Study Areas
datasets.description: Polygon boundaries of Wilderness Study Areas on BLM-administered lands.
datasets.notes: Includes WSAs and their current status relative to wilderness designation.
datasets.performance_notes: Static dataset; excellent for national web maps

datasets.title: BLM Oil and Gas Leases
datasets.description: Polygon representation of BLM-administered oil and gas lease areas.
datasets.notes: Represents active and historical oil and gas leases on BLM-administered lands.
datasets.performance_notes: Large feature count; consider filtering by state for web maps

datasets.title: BLM Rights-of-Way
datasets.description: Linear representation of rights-of-way authorized across BLM-administered lands.
datasets.notes: Includes major transmission, pipeline, road, and other rights-of-way.
datasets.performance_notes: High feature count and complex geometry; use generalized version for national maps
